QuestData.Title: Haohan's Vote III: Pure Poison
QuestData.Description: All right, $n. This is our big chance!$B$BMr. Mudclaw's farm is in big trouble. Those mountain hozen are coming down at night, wrecking his crops and eating his hard-earned harvest.$B$BWe've got to get rid of them for good, and I know just how to do it.$B$BBack in the day, my grandpa showed me how to mix a wounding poison to deal with the pests on the farm.$B$BThe virmen warrens to the north hold the key ingredients for my mixture.$B$BDon't look so worried, $n! I'm pretty sure this is going to work.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 1 Bloodbloom, 1 Cave Lily, 1 Ghostcap, and 1 Violet Lichen.
